item.title: King's Day
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: The No Mames trip took us to Amsterdam to experience the King’s day. Through this post we plan to relive the crazy memories of the festival ðŸ˜„ What is it about Koningsdag or King’s Day â€” formerly known as Queen’s Day is the annual Dutch holiday in honor of King Willem-Alexander. People dress up in orange, party, dance and get wasted. There are some concerts happening in some areas. There are flea markets and lot of street food and booze.
